ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Complete_Review_Reached__c = False, NOT((ISPICKVAL( Investigation_Required__c , ""))&& ISPICKVAL( Contributing_Factors__c , "")&& ISPICKVAL( Investigation_Completed__c , "") &&ISBLANK( CMPL123QMS__Investigation_Summary__c ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot select Investigation section fields before complete review
